u.a: <aft> attempts to turn shape box over but lid closes on fingers
<1w> opens shape box lid and holds it open
picks up shape box and dumps the objects on the floor . uses hand to help put the objects out
closes shape box lid and moves shape box
<1w> picks up object and puts in shape box . repeats three more times
picks up object and puts in shape box . repeats five times
picks up object and attempts to put it through the wrong hole
points to holes on shape box lid
puts object to wrong holes three times
opens shape box lid and drops object inside
takes object from Mother , opens shape box lid and drops object inside
<1w> picks up object and puts through hole in shape box . <1w> picks up object with one hand .
<1w> picks up object with other hand . puts one object down . <1w> attempts to put object in hole . tries another hole . tries two more times
<aft> holds out object to Mother . tries another hole
moves hand to show Sue how to turn object
slowly moves hand toward object . pushes object to hole . manipulates object around hole
<bef> object goes in hole . <dur> picks up another object . <aft> puts object to correct hole and manipulates around hole
<bef> object goes in hole . <dur> picks up another object and puts in correct hole
<1w> moves object inside shape box with finger
<bef> picks up object and puts on shape box . puts finger in hole to push object through like Mother did
<bef> puts hand on shape box lid . moves shape box aside
<bef> grasps nesting cups in dollhouse . <aft> slides dollhouse closer
<aft> takes one nesting cup off top of nesting cups . puts one nesting cup back on nesting cups
<1w> pushes dollhouse and shape box away
<bef> puts nesting cups in front of Mother
<bef> takes one nesting cup off top and puts on floor . takes another and puts on floor . moves nesting cups . takes nesting cup
<1w> tries to take another nesting cup but it is stuck . <1w> tries again and nesting cup comes out . <dur> sets nesting cup on floor
<1w> touches one nesting cup . <1w> touches two nesting cups .
<1w> takes out another nesting cup and puts on floor with others
<1w> takes out other cups and puts on floor .
<1w> takes more cups and puts on floor .
<1w> takes out two nesting cups that are stuck together . tries to pull apart
<1w> puts nesting cups in a line on the floor . takes another nesting cup and sets on floor
<1w> holds hand up to show height
